column1: in memory ofmary a. gasior 1924 - 2015 | mary a. gasior
column3: went to be with her lord on june 20
column5: 1924. mary was preceded in death by her husband of 26 years
column7: who passed away in 1972. left to cherish her memory is her daughter
column10: cindy (steve) zimmerman and christopher (eileen) gareau; 14 great-grandchildren and 10 great-great-grandchildren. mary was a devout catholic and enjoyed sunday mass. she loved word puzzles and shopping. mary was a dedicated grandmother who doted on her grandchildren. the family will receive guests from 1-3:00 p. m. on friday
column14: toledo (419-381-1900). a memorial service will begin at 3:00 p. m. in lieu of flowers
column15: the family has requested that donations be made to: hospice of northwest ohio or a charity of the donors choice.
